LightningComponentBundle.description: View videos attached to record detail pages, chatter or file detail pages.

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Title for the component

property.name: muted
property.label: Muted
property.description: Should the video start without sound (Recommended)

property.name: showVideoCountInTitle
property.label: Show Supported Video Count in Title
property.description: Displays a count of the number of available videos attached to the record when used on a record detail page

property.name: showVideoName
property.label: Show Video Title
property.description: Displays the title of the current video, when the component is present on a record detail page

property.name: showVideoDescription
property.label: Show Video Description
property.description: Displays the description for the current video, when the component is present on a record detail page

property.name: desktopWidth
property.label: Desktop Width
property.description: The width of the video's display area for desktop, in CSS pixels (absolute values only; no percentages.)

property.name: desktopHeight
property.label: Desktop Height
property.description: The height of the video's display area for desktop, in CSS pixels (absolute values only; no percentages.)

property.name: tabletWidth
property.label: Tablet Width
property.description: The width of the video's display area for tablets, in CSS pixels (absolute values only; no percentages.)

property.name: tabletHeight
property.label: Tablet Height
property.description: The height of the video's display area for tablets, in CSS pixels (absolute values only; no percentages.)

property.name: mobileWidth
property.label: Mobile Width
property.description: The width of the video's display area for mobile devices, in CSS pixels (absolute values only; no percentages.)

property.name: mobileHeight
property.label: Mobile Height
property.description: The height of the video's display area for mobile devices, in CSS pixels (absolute values only; no percentages.)

property.name: noVideoMessage
property.default: There are no supported videos (mp4, webm, mov, m4v) attached with this record.
property.label: No Supported Videos Message
property.description: The message to be dispalyed to the users when no supported video is attached to the record. This message is also displayed when viewing unsupported file formats on file details page

property.name: errorMessage
property.default: There was an error playing the video.
property.label: Error Message
property.description: The error message to be dispalyed to the users when there is an error playing the video.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: Automatically bind the page's record id to the component variable
